original_title: 待望の初コラボ！！原作・タカスギコウ淫戯の果て1 全2巻の人妻背徳長編コミックがついに忠実実写化！！
overview: Oda Mako works part-time at a supermarket and is a mediocre housewife who lives with her son, Satoshi. However, one day, she gets invited by young boys to a drinking party and committed a mistake…
title: Based on the Original Comic of Ko Takasugi “Inngi no Hate 1”, “The Corruption of the Married Woman” Edition is Nowa Live Action Film!!
